text:
Futubank, Moscow, Russia.

Looking for Python Developer.

We are 3-month-old startup, successfully funded, and we are starting new project related to credit card acquiring and e-commerce. In short, new and cool payment gate for internet shops.

Strong backend programming skills are required (Python, Linux, PostgreSQL, AWS, asynchronous data processing).

More info (in Russian): http://hantim.ru/jobs/30648-python-software-developer
